settings.title: Benefits
settings.content:
► Over $2.5 million of Terraflex sold

► Powered by generation 5 carbon technology

► Superior alternative to dyed window film

► Up to 67% infrared radiation (IR) heat rejection

► 99.9% ultraviolet (UV) protection

► Color stable

► Constructed with zero dye

► Advanced shrinking technology

► Carbamate HD adhesive

► Available in charcoal or black

► 2ply / 1.5mil thickness

► Backed by lifetime warranty

settings.text: Would you bring a knife to a gun fight? Carbon technology allows you to hold the smoking gun against your competitors slinging dyed film by simply blocking more solar energy and never fading and changing color.

settings.title: Extensive UV Protection
settings.text: Blocks over 99.9% of A and B ultraviolet (UV) rays from the sun that can lead to skin cancers and skin damage.

settings.title: More IR Rejection
settings.text: Nano particles of carbon found in the laminate adhesive allows Terraflex to block up to 67% of infrared radiation (IR) heat.

settings.title: Superior Alternative
settings.text: Terraflex offers more value by absorbing more solar energy and eliminating fade and color change all for around the same cost as dyed technology.

settings.title: True Carbon
settings.text: We rely on carbon alone to give the product its beautiful colors and consistent shades without the need for dye or pigment.

settings.title: Carbamate HD Adhesive
settings.text: Our proprietary high density adhesive lasts longer, bonds faster, and improves the ease of installation.

settings.title: No Fade and Color Change
settings.text: Constructed with zero dye, Terraflex will never fade or change color due to generation 5 carbon technology.

settings.title: Get The Perfect Match
settings.text: Choose between a natural charcoal or rich black color to match the factory tint on any vehicle.

settings.subtitle: Generation 5
settings.title: Carbon Technology
settings.text: In 2019, carbon window film saw a substantial upgrade to the adhesive system. The improved adhesive found in the laminate and mounting layers makes this generation clearer, longer lasting and easier to install. The size of the nano particles were made smaller than they had ever been before. So, with generation 5, the low angle haze is virtually undetectable. Generation five no longer feels rubbery or difficult to handle and is a breeze to install. The use of a super clear technology improved the polyester, and there is still no fading or color change over time, making generation five the most superior carbon window film on the market today.

settings.subtitle: An In-Depth Look
settings.title: Layer Breakdown
settings.text: Constructed as a traditional 2ply, 1.5mil film, Terraflex contains nano particles of carbon in between two weatherable layers of polyester that allows the product to block out most of the solar energy dyed film lets through. All of this is tied together with our superior Carbamate HD™ adhesive system designed to last longer, bond faster, and improves the ease of installation.

settings.subtitle: Adhesive Technology
settings.title: Carbamate HD
settings.text: Our proprietary high density adhesive lasts longer, bonds faster, is ultra clear, and is guaranteed to never bubble.

settings.testimonial: "I have been using Flexfilm for almost 7 years now and never had a problem."
settings.author: Zane Wilson

settings.testimonial: "Love the 30% Terraflex. Metered spot on for matching the factory tint."
settings.author: Shawn Davis

settings.testimonial: "I just started using Flexfilm. The Terraflex Black is an awesome film. Very easy application for bottom loading and the color is perfect!"
settings.author: Scott Little
